description: Come join car Ramrod and the rest of the gang!   Update v.3.1 brings new layout (no more paging back!) and requested clips! Thorny: "stinks of sex in here" & "Its Primetime for Crimetime!", Farva: "Open Bar Dude!" & "Farva's #1!", and Mack: "The Repeater".   Each page is scrollable up/down for PIXI users, because your screen is a little smaller than the Pre.  Nothing is better than having your 5 favorite highway patrolmen ready to break the ice sitting right in your pocket! Enjoy 37 sound clips from Officer Rabbit, Thorny, Farva, Mack and Foster! And you can't forget our favorite snozberry licking stoners! This is not your typical soundboard because it gives the feel of a film strip. Just scroll the strip to one of the frames, tap it and get ready to laugh!
